name: Keine's Super Succ Ultra
description:
There was a party at Hakurei shrine last night, everyone got drunk and mixed up their legend! Time for Keine to suck them history back into the right place.

Controls:
Move - Arrow Keys
Z - Jump
X - Succ
C - Unsucc

Alt + F4 - Quit

Gameplay:

Succ and unsucc terrain to help you platform

Goomba stomp enemies to kill them

Goomba stomp boss or suck some of their projectile to unsucc back at them

PS: You can succ the goal. If the goal seems missing, you may need to unsucc.

Credits
